titleStmt.title: Gray hayres crowned with grace. A sermon preached at Redriff, Aug. 1. 1654. at the funerall of that reverend, eminently learned and faithfull minister of Jesus Christ Mr Thomas Gataker.
titleStmt.author: Ashe, Simeon, d. 1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for George Sawbridge at the sign of the Bible on Ludgate-hill.,

notesStmt.note: Thomason copy bound with items from November of 1654.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bible on Ludgate-hill.
